title: Smart Data Models - PssWECC
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Dual input Power System Stabilizer, based on IEEE type 2, with modified output limiter defined by WECC (Western Electricity Coordinating Council, USA).

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be PssWECC

inputSignal1Type.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Type of input signal #1. Default: None

inputSignal2Type.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Type of input signal #2. Default: None

k1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Input signal 1 gain  (K). Default: 0.0

k2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Input signal 2 gain (K). Default: 0.0

t1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Input signal 1 transducer time constant (T). Default: 0

t10.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lag time constant (T). Default: 0

t2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Input signal 2 transducer time constant (T). Default: 0

t3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Stabilizer washout time constant (T). Default: 0

t4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Stabilizer washout time lag constant (T) (>0). Default: 0

t5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead time constant (T). Default: 0

t6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lag time constant (T). Default: 0

t7.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead time constant (T). Default: 0

t8.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lag time constant (T). Default: 0

t9.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead time constant (T). Default: 0

vcl.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum value for voltage compensator output (V). Default: 0.0

vcu.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum value for voltage compensator output (V). Default: 0.0

vsmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum output signal (Vsmax). Default: 0.0

vsmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum output signal (Vsmin). Default: 0.0
